title: Technical Solutions Engineer - Austin
content:
Senior Solution Engineer - Wise Platform
Compensation: $170,000 - $260,000 + RSUs + Benefits
We’re looking for a Senior Solution Engineer to join our growing team in Austin. 
The Wise Platform team works with financial institutions and major tech companies at a global level to offer Wise products and services directly to their customers through our API. We help partners to architect and build integrations to our class-leading international finance products, while improving Wise Platform by increasing the capabilities of our public API. The team’s goals are to drive the growth of Wise through partnerships and integrations by creating a world class product set delivered through third parties.
Your mission:
Based within the Wise platform team, your role will be to provide technical consulting  and product guidance to banks and other partners integrating Wise in their products, primarily in a post-sale capacity.
Working in conjunction with the technical presales team, you will be involved in the business development process where we need support for larger partners who require novel features to successfully integrate. 
You will assist the partners as they move into the implementation phase to define their technical solution, gather and document any new requirements and collaborate internally and externally to ensure successful integration delivery.
Manage multiple partner integrations in parallel and define and improve processes to increase efficiency in the team and deliver successful projects simultaneously.
You will participate in feature definition and prioritization alongside long term strategy planning with the rest of the Wise Platform team, as part of our quarterly planning sessions.
You will help partners to define and deliver the best integration possible within their unique constraints against our existing platform in order to provide a fantastic end customer experience.
With a high level of autonomy, you’ll work closely with Implementation Managers, Product Managers and Engineers and make product and project decisions with the team.
Some of your focus areas will be:
Work in improving the integration experience for banks in relation to documentation, public and private APIs, SDKs, examples, code samples and reference implementations.
Collaborate with the technical presales team to support the sales cycle and win new partnerships.
Improving internal processes to increase the team’s capacity to deliver multiple integrations in parallel.
When required, designing and developing new features across Wise services and exposing them on our public API.
Identify, troubleshoot, run test scenarios, and fix technical issues within the Wise product stack, assisting our API support team as a second line when complex issues arise.
This role will give you the opportunity to:
Choose your own path to success - you’ll have the freedom to define the vision and responsibility for making it happen.
Identify problems and unlock opportunities for Wise and partners through technology solutions.
Inspire other teams internally and externally with your ideas, knowledge and self-starter attitude.
Travel to work with our teams in New York and London as well as visit our partners across the Americas.
A bit about you:
You are from a software engineering background but also have experience working with  both tech and non-tech stakeholders to successfully deliver multiple technical projects concurrently.
You understand the value of balancing customer centric thinking with technical know-how, and can bridge the gap between business and technical experts.
You put the customer above technology, while finding ways to leverage technology to improve the customer experience.
You are personable and you are good at stakeholder management. You are able to represent Wise and our values to external partners in a professional way, explaining technical problems and solutions to non-technical audiences.
You have strong presentation and public speaking skills.
Experience with RESTful APIs, API Design, Swagger, OpenAPI, OAuth2.
Some extra skills that would be awesome:
Experience working across multiple programming languages, tech stacks and cloud providers.
Experience with our stack: Java within the Spring ecosystem, Kubernetes, AWS and service mesh architectures.
You have worked with distributed systems and monolithic architectures and understand the advantages and challenges of both.
Passion for international finance, foreign exchange and payment systems.
Demonstrated experience speaking at conferences and public events.What you get back:
🚀 RSU's in a rapidly growing company 
💪 An annual self-development budget
🩺 Medical, dental, & vision insurance – including HSA and FSA options
💝 Company-paid: Life Insurance, Short & Long-Term Disability, and an EAP program
💻 Hybrid working model – a mix of working from home and from the office
💻 Our employees can work remotely for 90 days a year. By ‘remote’ we don’t just mean from home, but from wherever in the world our employees choose. 
🌍 Relocation expenses covered
☀️ 25 days PTO, 15 sick days, 11 holidays, 5 compassionate leave days, 3 paid “Me” days and a paid volunteer day, annually
🏝️ A paid 6-week sabbatical leave after four years 
👶🏼 18-weeks of paid parental leave, after a year with us
💰 401k with up to a 4% employer match 
Find out more about our benefits in our Austin office (Same for NYC office).
Interested? Find out more:
How we work – a practical guide
Wise Vlogs: Omar, Engineering Lead 
Engineering team blog
How our Engineers build new features
We’re people without borders — without judgement or prejudice, too. We want to work with the best people, no matter their background. So if you’re passionate about learning new things and keen to join our mission, you’ll fit right in.
Also, qualifications aren’t that important to us. If you’ve got great experience, and you’re great at articulating your thinking, we’d like to hear from you.
And because we believe that diverse teams build better products, we’d especially love to hear from you if you’re from an under-represented demographic.
#LI-Hybrid#LI-RA1Salary (annual)$170,000—$260,000 USDWe're people without borders — without judgement or prejudice, too. We believe teams are strongest when they are diverse, equitable and inclusive. We're proud to have a truly international team, and we celebrate our differences.
Every Wiser should feel that they can be themselves at work. Inclusive teams help us live our values and make sure every Wiser feels respected, empowered to share their contributions towards mission zero and able to progress in their careers.
Having diverse teams that reflect our diverse customer base helps us build a better product. We can be more creative and empathetic to our customer's needs and life experiences and makes sure we leave no-one behind on our journey to mission-zero.
If you want to find out more about what it's like to work at Wise visit Wise.Jobs.
Keep up to date with life at Wise by following us on LinkedIn and Instagram.

questions.label: What's your desired gross salary, annually?
Are you currently based in the Austin area? If not, are you willing to relocate?
Do you now, or will you in the future, require sponsorship for a visa (or a visa transfer) to work legally for Wise in the United States?
At Wise we work based on a Hybrid model, a combination of work from home and from the office (on a weekly basis), does this work for you?
If you’re not currently based in a commutable distance to the location of this job, are you willing to relocate?

By answering yes, you confirm that all information provided in support of this application, including but not limited to my resume or curriculum vitae and the above information, is true and correct. I understand that false statements or material omissions of any kind during the hiring process may result in denial of employment or discharge.I understand and agree that if I am employed, I will be employed on an at-will basis. As an at-will employee, I understand and agree that either Wise or I can terminate our employment relationship, at any time for any reason, with or without advance notice and with or without cause.I understand that nothing contained in this employment application or interview process is intended to create an employment contract between Wise and me.
